item.content:encoded: Gif: Supergiant Games Play the original before Supergiant‚Äôs sequel enters early access Hades, the supremely successful Roguelike from the team at Supergiant Games, is discounted to its lowest price ever on Steam through May 13. item.content:encoded: Image: Slavic Magic/Hooded Horse We need more games like this I should have been enjoying the beach. I was on vacation, far from my gaming PC, and close to soothing, rolling waves. But instead, my mind kept drifting to a landlocked chunk of 14th century Germany. Few games have wormed their way into my brain like Manor Lords. item.content:encoded: Image: Double Dagger Studio Time to meow meow your way through the big city Two iconic video game characters join the Xbox Game Pass lineup this May: Lara Croft and an adorable little kitty. Sure, one character definitely has more brand name recognition over the other, but it‚Äôs hard to resist the adoring gaze of a big-eyed black cat. This month, Tomb Raider: Definitive Edition and the charming indie game Little Kitty, Big City enter the catalog of games available for free on Xbox Games Pass. Th...

item.content:encoded: Image: Blizzard Entertainment The new season starts on May 14 and is D4‚Äôs biggest yet Diablo 4‚Äôs new Loot Reborn update is nearly here, and will launch on May 14. Season 4‚Äôs theme is relatively light, it seems, but that‚Äôs to make way for the game‚Äôs biggest overhaul yet: loot. If you were tired of the classic ‚Äúdamage on Tuesdays‚Äù affixes and the general chaos of the game‚Äôs loot over the past year, Blizzard finally has you covered. Below, we‚Äôve highlighted some of the biggest changes coming with...

item.title: Take-Two will reportedly close OlliOlli and Kerbal Space Program studios | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Roll7/Private Division Roll7 and Intercept Games to be shuttered amid layoffs Bloomberg reports that Grand Theft Auto publisher Take-Two Interactive will close two game studios as part of a r...
item.content:encoded: Image: Roll7/Private Division Roll7 and Intercept Games to be shuttered amid layoffs Bloomberg reports that Grand Theft Auto publisher Take-Two Interactive will close two game studios as part of a recently announced plan to lay off 5% of its workforce. The two studios are London-based Roll7, developer of the much-loved OlliOlli skating games, and Intercept Games, a Seattle outfit formed by Take-Two to make Kerbal Space Program 2. Both studios were part of Take-Two‚Äôs boutique publishing label P...

item.title: In a golden age of Star Wars board games, these are the best options | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Charlie Hall/Polygon Epic strategy games, fast-paced card games, miniatures games, and more Always in motion is the future of the Star Wars universe... at least when it comes to movies and te...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Charlie Hall/Polygon Epic strategy games, fast-paced card games, miniatures games, and more Always in motion is the future of the Star Wars universe... at least when it comes to movies and television, where well more than half of the projects currently in development still have no publicly available release date. The world of Star Wars tabletop games, on the other hand, is a bit more predictable. Both this year and last, it seems like new releases have been coming down the Pyke just abo...
